items.content_html: A lightweight browser extension that enhances your Twitch viewing experience by providing instant game information for streams you're watching. When browsing Twitch, GameScanner displays detailed information about the current game being streamed, including prices across different platforms, store links, and key details - all without leaving Twitch.
items.title: ethhix/GameScanner: A lightweight browser extension that enhances your Twitch viewing experience by providing instant game information for streams you're watching. When browsing Twitch, GameScanner displays detailed information about the current game being streamed, including prices across different platforms, store links, and key details - all without leaving Twitch.
